sentence.Network_en: The imbibation of the evening had not yet worn off.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚上的酒劲还没有完全消失.

list.abs: 石油英语词汇... ... invading water 侵入水 invading-imbibing wetting phase 驱替-自吸润湿相 invalid contract 无效合同.
i always imbibe fresh air in the woods ., 我经常在树林里呼吸新鲜空气.
吸收_英文... ... assimilate the results of scientific research 吸收科研成果 absorb knowledge;imbibe knowledge 吸收知识.
